meanings.definition: The quality of being extensive or widespread.
meanings.sent1: The extensiveness of the forest amazed the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The extensiveness of the desert made it seem endless.
meanings.sent3: The extensiveness of the buffet left everyone feeling full and happy.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as vast as the extensiveness of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The extensiveness of the library's collection was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: The state of covering a large area or range.
meanings.sent1: The extensiveness of the carpet made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent2: The extensiveness of the park allowed for many activities.
meanings.sent3: The extensiveness of the pizza toppings surprised the customers.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge had the extensiveness of a map covering the whole world.
meanings.sent5: The extensiveness of the garden impressed the visitors.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is extensive in scope or size.
meanings.sent1: The extensiveness of the project required a lot of planning.
meanings.sent2: The extensiveness of the problem demanded a comprehensive solution.
meanings.sent3: The extensiveness of the ice cream flavors made it hard to choose.
meanings.sent4: The extensiveness of her wardrobe was like a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The extensiveness of the mountain range was breathtaking.
